description.value:
You enjoy mentoring others and take pride in your students' accomplishments. If you get a critical failure on an attempt to Aid, you get a failure instead. Whenever you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Aid] an ally who critically succeeds on the check you Aided them on, you feel a rush of pride, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level, which last for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Proud Mentor]
